rules_text:
When Wildlife Cartographer enters, look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a creature and/or land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
Conceptualize {2}{G} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its conceptualize cost. If you do, exile it when it enters the battlefield.)[/i]
